snippet: The arrests were made in connection with the killings of 10 Muslims that helped incite days of sectarian violence last month in which at least 80 people were killed.
abstract: Police in Myanmar arrest 30 people in connection with the vigilante killings of 10 Muslims that helped incite days of sectarian violence in Rakhine State in June in which at least 80 people were killed and tens of thousands were displaced.
lead_paragraph: The arrests were made in connection with the killings of 10 Muslims that helped incite days of sectarian violence last month in which at least 80 people were killed.

headline.main: Myanmar: 30 Arrested in the Killings of Muslims
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: 30 Arrested in the Killings of Muslims
